member.name: T:Windows.Foundation.Gen2GcCallback
member.summary: Schedules a callback roughly every gen 2 GC (you may see a Gen 0 an Gen 1 but only once) (We can fix this by capturing the Gen 2 count at startup and testing, but I mostly don't care)

member.name: M:Windows.Foundation.Gen2GcCallback.Register(System.Func{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Schedule 'callback' to be called in the next GC. If the callback returns true it is rescheduled for the next Gen 2 GC. Otherwise the callbacks stop.

member.name: M:Windows.Foundation.Gen2GcCallback.Register(System.Func{System.Object,System.Boolean},System.Object)
member.summary:
Schedule 'callback' to be called in the next GC. If the callback returns true it is rescheduled for the next Gen 2 GC. Otherwise the callbacks stop.
NOTE: This callback will be kept alive until either the callback function returns false, or the target object dies.
